strings.I位面熔炉: When magnetic monopoles travel through the Plane Filter, they generate quantum effects, which can produce thermodynamic negative temperature flow. Ores can be smelted or purified at accelerated rates using this principle.
strings.I熔炉 Mk.III: After energy has been put in continuously, the stimulated negentropy singularity in the Smelter can steadily give off negentropy. Despite the fact that little negentropy is obtained, after being repeated and repeated the process can efficiently restore ores to their elemental states from impure ones.
strings.I制造台 Mk.I: The basic assembler can transform primary items such as iron and copper ingots into more advanced products.
strings.I制造台 Mk.II: With significantly improved production speed, items can be produced more quickly.
strings.I制造台 Mk.III: It maximizes the production speed. Conveyor Belts and Sorters of different speeds can be combined to avoid empty assemblers or product overflow.
strings.I制造台 Mk.IV: The AI module can analyze the recipe of an item in real time and decompose raw materials into particles by precisely controlling the structure and compound mode of molecules. After that, it then re-composes particles to form required items and performs Quantum Printing, greatly improving manufacturing speed.
strings.I原油精炼厂: Refined oil and hydrogen are obtained by further refining extracted crude oil.
strings.I化工厂: It is a chemical production facility that can process the primary products of crude oil into more advanced chemical products.
strings.I化工厂 Mk.II: Quantum entanglement formed via Strange Matter at specific points could decouple the most complicated part of the chaos phenomenon in chemical reactions. This may lead the reactions toward a predetermined direction. If these magic points could evolve, they could catalyze the corresponding chemical reactions.
strings.I喷涂机: Fitting the Spray Coater to a Conveyor Belt and feeding it to the Proliferator through the upper port allows cargo on the Conveyor Belt to be sprayed. Production is either accelerated or extra products gained when cargo sprayed with the Proliferator is used as raw material to create next-level products.
strings.I分馏塔: Deuterium can be fractionated from liquid hydrogen efficiently by utilizing the high vapor pressure ratio of liquid hydrogen to liquid deuterium at a certain temperature. A Conveyor Belt is used to import hydrogen from one side. After fractionation, the hydrogen will be exported from the other side, and the fractionated deuterium will be exported from the front port.
strings.I微型粒子对撞机: New particles can be produced when two streams of accelerated particles, upon reaching a certain intensity and energy, collide. It is usually employed to create stable deuterium and antimatter, but consumes considerable energy.
strings.I矩阵研究站: It is a type of connector for the CentreBrain, which can either produce matrices or conduct research. The more Matrix Labs, the faster the production and research speeds.
strings.I矩阵研究站 Mk.II: A Self-evolution Lab allows silicon-based neurons to autonomously adjust and improve neural networking while constantly learning and adapting, similar to the synaptic plasticity of biological neurons. Over time, silicon-based neurons can keep optimizing their own structures and function through self-evolution to solve problems more effectively.
strings.I电磁轨道弹射器: It ejects considerable Solar Sails to integrate with the Dyson Swarm.
strings.I垂直发射井: It launches Small Carrier Rockets carrying components into the Dyson Sphere orbit to form Nodes and Frames.
strings.I高斯机枪塔: An EM field is used to accelerate bullet speed. 48mm bullets form dense and intense firepower. The damage inflicted to low-air units as a result should not be underestimated.
strings.I高频激光塔: High-energy laser beams will be emitted to keep strafing enemy units when they enter the defensive range. High temperatures lead to sustained damage to targets. Laser Towers' high-frequency lasers can hit targets precisely and in a short period of time, but they consume a lot of energy.
strings.I聚爆加农炮: After hitting a target, a 280mm shell can cause a wide-ranging explosive blast and inflict Explosive Damage to units and facilities in the vicinity. Additionally, due to its design characteristics Implusion Cannon can't be used to attack close targets.
strings.I磁化电浆炮: After being stimulated, the matter inside an energy capsule will be in a high-energy plasma state. It will then be quickly emitted by the Plasma Turret's accelerator to generate high-speed plasma beams. Such beams are extremely penetrating and destructive, and can effectively destroy space targets.
strings.I导弹防御塔: Equipped with an advanced missile launcher and a target identification system, Turrets can quickly identify and locate both ground and space targets. Once they lock onto a target, they will then launch missiles. They are designed to respond to multiple threats with all-around defense.
strings.I干扰塔: They can cause EM interference that affects nearby enemy units. The specific effect depends on the type of EM Capsule.
strings.I信标: A tactical defensive facility that periodically sends out signals at a specific frequency to induce Dark Fog, change the direction of an attack and increase the unit assembling speed. Signal Towers can form a data chain with Missile Turrets for information sharing, thus expanding the attack range of Missile Turrets.
strings.I护盾发生器: They can create Planetary Shields on planets to resist attacks from space. Massive amounts of energy are required for a Planetary Shield. If the shield becomes ineffective, it will leave the planet exposed to serious threats from space. Additionally, the number of Shield Generators that can be built on a planet is limited.\r\nPlanetary Shield can only resist damage from space, it cannot defend ground damage.
strings.I电磁矩阵: The foundation of all technological research as one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation.
strings.I能量矩阵: The Energy Matrix is a major driver of further technological development as one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation.
strings.I结构矩阵: Useful for obtaining new and improved structural materials as one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation.
strings.I信息矩阵: One of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. The level of computerization significantly affects how well the Homebase operates.
strings.I引力矩阵: One of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. It finds a way to make quantum field theory and general relativity compatible.
strings.I宇宙矩阵: The triumphant, all-encompassing culmination of the theory of everything, revealing the ultimate secret of the universe!
strings.R等离子精炼: Refine crude oil with plasma to obtain hydrogen and refined oil.
strings.RX射线裂解: Through the catalytic action of hydrogen gas, the refined oil is subjected to X-ray irradiation, leading to its cracking and yielding an increased quantity of hydrogen, as well as a byproduct: Energetic Graphite.
strings.R卡西米尔晶体（高效）: The utilization of the rare Grating Crystal for the production of Casimir Crystal results in significantly enhanced efficiency.
strings.R石墨烯（高效）: Fire Ice Vein would greatly facilitate the production of graphene.
strings.R碳纳米管（高效）: It is feasible to produce Carbon Nanotubes using Stalagmite Crystal, however, this ore is quite rare and difficult to locate.
strings.R晶格硅（高效）: The unique fractal structure possessed by Fractal Silicon makes it the preferred material for the efficient production of crystal silicon.
strings.R金刚石（高效）: Find Kimberlite Ore and you can smelt it to produce diamonds.
strings.R光子合并器（高效）: The discovery of Grating Crystal would facilitate the production of Photon Combiner.
strings.R光子物质化: Under the influence of an intense magnetic field, Critical Photons can be converted into Antimatter and hydrogen.
strings.R粒子容器（高效）: While Unipolar Magnets are exceedingly rare, their discovery would enable more efficient production of Particle Containers.
strings.R重氢分馏: The successful fractionation of deuterium from liquid hydrogen has greatly advanced the utilization of nuclear fuel.
strings.R空间翘曲器（高级）: The existence of Gravity Matrix facilitates the production of Space Warpers.
strings.R有机晶体（原始）: The processing of wood, plant fuel, and water resources yields Organic Crystal.
strings.R重整精炼: By adding hydrogen and coal to refined oil and subjecting it to a process of reformation, a greater quantity of refined oil can be produced.
strings.戴森球计划描述: Welcome to the Dyson Sphere Program!\r\nYou will establish a giant intergalactic industrial empire from scratch, and carve out your own path to a miracle of the universe, the Dyson Sphere.
strings.电磁学描述: The poetic Maxwell's equations showcased to the world the relationship between electricity and magnetism. Based on a profound understanding of these knowledge, efficient machines for acquiring and utilizing electrical energy have been created.
strings.电磁矩阵描述: The Electromagnetic Matrix is the foundation of all technologies as one of the five basic source codes for CentreBrain to maintain Homeland simulation. Upload Electromagnetic Matrices to unlock more technologies.
strings.高效电浆控制描述: The modified Plasma Exciter features improved stability and efficiency due to its more efficient use of plasma via electric and magnetic fields.
strings.等离子萃取精炼描述: New plasma technology facilitates industrial development by drastically improving crude oil refinement efficiency.
strings.X射线裂解描述: High-energy X-ray photocatalysis produces more hydrogen via the pyrolysis of refined oil. It also produces Energetic Graphite through pyrolysis byproduct processing.
strings.重整精炼描述: Breakthroughs in chemical engineering have increased the efficiency of refined oil production by reforming it with hydrogen and coal.
strings.能量矩阵描述: Energy Matrix is the key to the source of energy as one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. Upload Energy Matrices to unlock more energy technologies.
strings.氢燃料棒描述: Due to the improvement of cryogenic technology, gaseous hydrogen can condense itself into a fluid to make liquid hydrogen fuel rods with a higher combustion efficiency. Using it as a fuel for the mecha can dramatically improve its combustion output.
strings.推进器描述: A high-efficiency engine that propels Logistics Drones to travel between Planetary Logistics Stations on a planet via the counterforce generated by the high-speed ejection of plasma mass.
strings.加力推进器描述: An upgraded engine that propels Logistics Vessels to travel between planets.
strings.流体储存封装描述: Enables the containerization of fluids for more convenient transportation.
strings.基础化工描述: Scientific development would have stalled without chemical engineering.
strings.高分子化工描述: A new polymer synthesis technology that processes refined oil and plastic into a new material, Organic Crystal.
strings.高强度晶体描述: High-strength titanium crystals are obtained by altering the lattice structure of titanium atoms by adding a precise proportion of Organic Crystal.
strings.结构矩阵描述: Structure Matrices are one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. Uploading Structure Matrices increases expertise on material structures.
strings.卡西米尔晶体描述: A ring-shaped space crystal built with a strong electrical field and utilizing the Coulomb repulsion between particles. Using a weak, static magnetic field produces a significant Casimir effect.
strings.高强度玻璃描述: High-density glass, with higher complexity and density, suitable for industrial manufacturing. It is obtained by adding a set proportion of titanium and Organic Crystal to molten glass.
strings.应用型超导体描述: The emergence of graphene is a breakthrough in material technology. Superconductivity can be detected in twisted bilayer graphene at a certain "magic angle".
strings.高强度材料描述: Harder than diamonds, Carbon Nanotubes are used to manufacture special objects that can maintain structural integrity in high-pressure industrial environments.
strings.粒子可控技术描述: Mastering Particle Manipulation technology is greatly beneficial despite its profundity and complexity. Particle Manipulation is much easier once the particle structure adopts a pattern under certain conditions.
strings.重氢分馏描述: Deuterium can be fractionated from liquid hydrogen efficiently by utilizing the high vapor pressure ratio of liquid hydrogen to liquid deuterium at a certain temperature.
strings.波函数干扰描述: Several actions can be taken to cause interference in a particle's wave function by mastering the pattern of probability variations in a quantum jump, which means quantum collapse can be predicted more easily. Utilizing this technology may be more friendly to the cat.
strings.微型粒子对撞机描述: As an expensive but valuable project, the construction of a Small Particle Collider requires advanced materials and a large energy supply.
strings.奇异物质描述: Strange Matter is a degenerate matter that contains strange quarks from atom nuclei. It is produced by subjecting iron steam to the enormous energy generated from deuterium-deuterium fusion and compressing iron steam into a minuscule point.
strings.人造恒星描述: A more stable output of the Power Grid generated from matter-Antimatter collisions can be achieved by regulating an Annihilation Constraint Sphere. The technology also demonstrates an energy efficiency that is high enough to produce stable core radiation with wavelengths visible to the human eye, making the reactor a "burning little sun".
strings.可控湮灭反应描述: When a matter particle collides with an Antimatter particle, its annihilation generates massive energy. The robust utilization of the energy is achieved when the annihilation process is controllable.
strings.增产剂 Mk.I描述: Proliferators have transformed the entire production system. When they are sprayed onto products by Spray Coater, extra products or a production speedup effect is gained.
strings.增产剂 Mk.II描述: Proliferator MK.II is invented with an upgraded formula. This is used to generate more extra products or enhance the production speedup effect.
strings.增产剂 Mk.III描述: It is clear that using proliferators in industrial production has made a difference. So due to this new understanding, upgrading Proliferators is a high priority. As material technology and manufacturing techniques have improved, the invention of Proliferator MK.III has had a significant effect on product proliferation, though it tightly regulates product line design.
strings.基础制造工艺描述: A basic assembling machine that integrates traditional mechanical technology to process primary objects into advanced products.
strings.高速制造工艺描述: An upgraded version of the basic assembling machine with improved product manufacturing speeds.
strings.量子打印技术描述: The 3D microscopic structure of particles can be manipulated to maximize manufacturing speed by using Quantum Printing technology.
strings.处理器描述: A large-scale integrated circuit for efficient data processing and processing control.
strings.量子芯片描述: A quantum chip increases the probabilities of particles found in certain states by interfering with the wave functions of particles during a quantum jump in line with the corresponding Rabi oscillations.
strings.半导体材料描述: Semiconductive microcrystalline components are an ideal material for processor production.
strings.信息矩阵描述: Instant and effective information transfer can lead to a drastic improvement in industrial production. Obtaining more information technologies by uploading Information Matrices improves the information management of automated production lines.
strings.自动化冶金描述: The invention of Arc Smelters has boosted the development of metallurgical technology. A Smelter enhances smelting efficiency with automation.
strings.冶炼提纯描述: Resulting from recent advances in metallurgy, ore purification technology enables the extraction of high-purity advanced products.
strings.晶体冶炼描述: With a better understanding of lattice structures and advancements in refining technology, a more advanced smelting method for the preparation of high-strength crystals is available.
strings.钢材冶炼描述: Smelting iron ingots with a Smelter at very strict and controlled temperatures will improve the products' mechanical properties by altering their crystal forms.
strings.火力发电描述: A power plant in which the heat energy of combustible fuels is partially converted to energy output.
strings.钛矿冶炼描述: Due to advancements in mining and smelting it has become easier to acquire and control titanium mining and to use it.
strings.高强度钛合金描述: A novel alloy material with improved tensity and durability. Prepared by adding a set formula of alloy elements to titanium during the smelting process, in adherence with the temperature-dependent lattice structure of titanium.
strings.移山填海工程描述: Extracting soil pile from elevated surfaces for land reclamation facilitates factory construction. Both soil extraction and land reclamation require Foundation.
strings.微型核聚变发电描述: The newest generation of controlled fusion that enables the creation of compact fusion reactors by using a stellarator to confine static, high-temperature plasma in reactor cores with typical Deuteron Fuel Rods.
strings.位面冶金描述: Research shows that a particle flow at a thermodynamically negative temperature can be generated by filtering the quantum states of monopoles with the Wave Function Interference technology. Utilizing this phenomenon will substantially accelerate the smelting or purification of ores.
strings.太阳能收集描述: Solar panels only collect a tiny proportion of the sun's electromagnetic radiation energy, so a more efficient method is needed.
strings.光子变频描述: A Photon Combiner effectively reduces the losses in solar energy collection by converting low-frequency photons into high-frequency ones.
strings.太阳帆轨道系统描述: Use <color="#FD965ECC">EM-Rail Ejectors</color> to launch <color="#FD965ECC">Solar Sails</color> on a continuous and massive scale to form a Dyson Swarm for collecting stellar radiation energy more efficiently.
strings.射线接收站描述: The Ray Receiver can receive high-energy rays that are transmitted back from the Dyson Sphere and directly output the energy it has received to the Power Grid. The efficiency of ray reception determines the energy obtained.
strings.行星电离层利用描述: The Planetary Ionosphere Utilization technology gives a Ray Receiver more time for high-energy radiation in a day and night cycle by extending the effective altitude for receiving rays to the outer boundary of the exosphere and increasing their operation times.
strings.狄拉克逆变机制描述: Revealed by the reverse study on the Dirac equation, proton-antiproton pairs can be easily produced via the collision between vibrating open strings in a critical state that are generated from the concentration of gamma rays. This technology will drastically improve the efficiency of Ray Receivers and convert stellar energy into Antimatter for storage.
strings.宇宙矩阵描述: As an ultimate product of the theory of everything that explains the mystery of the universe, the all-encompassing Universe Matrix reveals the sameness of materials, energy, and information.
strings.任务完成描述: Congratulations, Builder of the Great Civilization!\r\nYour diligence is rewarded with the completion of the main mission of the Dyson Sphere Program. (The game will continue after completion).
strings.能量储存描述: Use an <color="#FD965ECC">Accumulator</color> to store surplus power in Power Grid. The Accumulator also helps maintain factory operations by automatically releasing stored power when on-grid power is insufficient.
strings.星际电力运输描述: Use an <color="#FD965ECC">Energy Exchanger</color> to achieve interstellar power transmission by converting surplus power in the Power Grid into fully charged Accumulators and discharging them on another planet from another <color="#FD965ECC">Energy Exchanger</color>.
strings.高强度轻质结构描述: A new high-density, lightweight structure made of Carbon Nanotubes with a higher resistance to stellar gravity than traditional structures.
strings.垂直发射井描述: Launch <color="#FD965ECC">Dyson Sphere Components</color> with a <color="#FD965ECC">Small Carrier Rocket</color> to add to the Frames and Nodes of a Dyson Sphere.
strings.戴森球应力系统描述: The stress distribution on the surface of a Dyson Sphere Node becomes more complex at higher latitudes, so it will be harder to balance the stress system.
strings.基础物流系统描述: Use <color="#FD965ECC">Conveyor Belts</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">Sorters</color> to enable automated production by transporting cargo from one place to another.
strings.改良物流系统描述: A <color="#FD965ECC">Splitter</color> increases the variety of designs of automated transport lines by dividing cargo into multiple batches for easier distribution or by coordinating multiple Conveyor Belts.\r\nUse TAB to switch the style.
strings.高效物流系统描述: Sorter MK.III sorts cargo more effectively, so it is more useful when demand for resources surges.
strings.集装物流系统描述: With a deeper understanding of material structures, the Integrated Logistics technology has now improved and increased the carrying capacity of Conveyor Belts by combining two successive objects on a Conveyor Belt into one.
strings.配送物流系统描述: Use Logistics Distributors and Logistics Bots to achieve cargo distribution between Depots or between Depot and Icarus <color="#FD965ECC">on a planet</color>.
strings.行星物流系统描述: <color="#FD965ECC">Planet-wide</color> cargo transportation can be achieved through Planetary Logistics Stations and Logistics Drones when the material technology reaches a certain level. With proper configuration of supply tasks, automatic cargo delivery is possible with Logistics Drones.
strings.星际物流系统描述: A giant space elevator for more convenient interstellar material transportation.
strings.气态行星开采描述: A gas giant is rich in resources, and its mining shows that technology has reached an unprecedented heights.
strings.电磁驱动描述: Unlock the Electric Motor, the basic component of a power system.
strings.磁悬浮技术描述: An Electromagnetic Turbine generates magnetic force to make objects defy gravity.
strings.粒子磁力阱描述: This device is developed when material technology reaches a certain level. It can confine particles and cause them to behave in certain ways.
strings.引力波折射描述: An intricate Graviton Lens made of Strange Matter that is used to distort its peripheral space and refract passing gravitons.
strings.引力矩阵描述: Gravity Matrices are one of the five basic source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. Researching them has reconciled the Quantum Field Theory and the General Theory of Relativity.
strings.超级磁场发生器描述: Albeit extremely challenging, the robust creation of a high-intensity artificial magnetic field is the key to the development of other advanced technologies. The mastery of the Super Magnetic Field Excitation technology will prove to be a decisive move in technological development.
strings.卫星配电系统描述: Utilizing the strong magnetic fields stimulated by the super magnetic field ring can transmit electricity over long distances to a wider coverage.
strings.地热开采描述: A lava planet is rich in magma with enormous energy, which can be exploited with Geothermal Extraction technology.
strings.大型采矿机描述: In a certain gravitational field, a significant photon-bunching effect can be caused by regulating the propagation of a photon group with positive interference generated by quantum chips in the group's transitions. Such a high-energy laser beam (photon bunch) can instantly cleave a ore vein and convert ores into particles for transportation and encapsulation, which significantly improves the efficiency of mining.
strings.高级化工描述: The massive computing power of quantum chips enables the placement of Strange Matter in specific points, which amplifies the entanglement effect of single quanta to the macromolecular level. With this technology, revolutionizing the traditional chemical engineering industry is easy.
strings.武器系统描述: Once weapons appear, the tables are turned. Icarus has what it needs to fight Dark Fog and guard the base, and it can calmly respond to raids as well.
strings.燃烧单元描述: Coal can release power more efficiently and powerfully after its molecular geometry has been elaborately modified.
strings.爆破单元描述: A classic chemical formula. After reaction conditions and raw material ratios have been optimized, reliable explosives can be made and casually handled.
strings.晶石爆破单元描述: Increasingly intense combats cries for Explosive Units that can inflict both wider and greater damage. Casimir Crystal's special lattice structure can improve the power of Explosive Units and allow them to fracture into sharp shards when sustaining an extreme impact.
strings.动力引擎描述: The importance of space forces is self-evident. Having a strong space defense is a game-changer on the battlefield. Air power units made from primary raw materials are simple yet reliable.
strings.导弹防御塔描述: With an advanced identification and position system, a Missile Turret can precisely hit ground and space units, and can also defend a base in an all-around way. Although its structure is complicated, it's very practical.
strings.聚爆加农炮描述: After precise calculation, Combustible Units are specially distributed in a shell to trigger aggregated explosions. Since explosive products and energy are concentrated, the damage inflicted is greater.
strings.信号塔描述: Long-term research found that Dark Fog is especially sensitive to certain wave bands of signals. Maybe this can be used to produce a facility that triggers Dark Fog's hatred and induces it for a targeted attack.
strings.行星防御系统描述: How should we respond to a herd of enemies? Use Planetary Shield Generator to build a solid barrier for the whole planet! It's worth a try, though massive energy will be consumed. You must prepare for enemies from deep space.
strings.干扰塔描述: Electromagnetic weapons are generally effective against mechanical entities.
strings.磁化电浆炮描述: Through stimulation of electric fields and control of magnetic fields, gaseous substances are ionized to form a rapidly moving plasma flow and achieved the ability to inflict major damage.
strings.钛化弹箱描述: Since this involves Dark Fog, sharper warheads are required to pierce enemies' armor. Magnum Ammo Boxes that have been improved with titanium ingots will inflict greater damage.
strings.超合金弹箱描述: The shape and structure of shell cases are what determine the speed and penetrability of bullets. How does one achieve a higher initial speed and a steadier flight performance? A high-intensity, low-density titanium alloy is the optimal material. Let the bullets fly further!
strings.高爆炮弹组描述: The newer shells require higher explosive capacity and greater stability.
strings.超音速导弹组描述: More precise control and propulsion systems enable higher levels of accuracy and greater attack capabilities for missiles.
strings.晶石炮弹组描述: High-pressure gases and shock waves resulting from explosions can quickly rupture surrounding materials and turn them into fast-moving shards. Such shards have huge amounts of kinetic energy and can destroy and damage targets in a short time.
strings.引力导弹组描述: Missiles' surrounding space is warped due to the negative gravitational pressure of Strange Matter, thereby accelerating missiles. Flatten all enemies!
strings.反物质胶囊描述: The majority of enemies will be destroyed immediately due to the enormous amount of energy generated from the annihilation reaction as matter and antimatter collide.
strings.地面战斗机-A型描述: Power and Weapon systems are enhanced based on a modified prototype to give them a longer range and faster speed.
strings.地面战斗机-E型描述: In addition to Turrets in fixed areas, Icarus also needs some active means to launch attack. A simply built Combat Drone would be its best partner.
strings.地面战斗机-F型描述: Based on a prototype that is constantly being optimized, more powerful Armor and Weapon systems are equipped to attack enemies nearby and provide powerful support to Icarus on the battlefield.
strings.太空战斗机-A型描述: As Dark Fog launches raids here and there, the fight is no longer limited to the ground. It's time to deploy space forces!
strings.太空战斗机-F型描述: We've realized the importance and complexity of Warships from the fights against Dark Fog space forces. Warships require strong power and excellent survival capabilities if they are to help Icarus gain an advantage on the battlefield.
strings.战场分析基站描述: We need an autonomous battlefield command and a combat support system when Icarus is away from the base.
strings.数字模拟计算描述: To avoid wasting valuable computing power on useless matters, digital simulation enables analog computations via discrete electrical signals and outputs answers to complicated problems, much like a biological brain does.\r\n<color="#FD965ECC">Warning:</color> This technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. <color="#FD965ECC">Please initiate such research manually.</color>
strings.物质重组技术描述: Matter Recombinator re-composes raw materials at particle size to massively accelerate manufacturing speed. Yet these core components can only be obtained from high-level Dark Fog Debris.\r\n<color="#FD965ECC">Warning:</color> This technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. <color="#FD965ECC">Please initiate such research manually.</color>
strings.负熵递归描述: In the context of self-similar calls, the notion that matter can generate negentropy implies a possibility where disordered matter could potentially undergo a spontaneous transition toward greater orderliness.\r\n<color="#FD965ECC">Warning:</color> This technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. <color="#FD965ECC">Please initiate such research manually.</color>
strings.金色燃料棒描述: The captivating topology of resonant particles, combined with antimatter, can undergo stable annihilation reactions at specific frequencies. Moreover, this annihilation reaction can generate an energy resonance effect, making energy output more efficient.\r\n<color="#FD965ECC">Warning:</color> This technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. <color="#FD965ECC">Please initiate such research manually.</color>
strings.机甲核心描述: Improves the mecha core and increase the durability, laser attack range, laser damage and energy capacity of the Core Energy.
strings.机甲核心描述2: Further improves the mecha core and greatly increase the durability, laser weapon damage and its energy capacity.
strings.机械骨骼描述: Increases the mecha’s basic movement speed.
strings.机械骨骼描述2: Further increases the mecha’s basic movement speed. This consumes more energy.
strings.机舱容量描述: Increases the Inventory space for items so the mecha can carry more items.
strings.机舱容量描述2: Increases the Inventory and Logistics List space so the mecha can carry more items.
strings.通讯控制描述: A strong and robust communication network allows the mecha to control more Construction Drones.
strings.通讯控制描述2: Increase the number of controllable Construction Drones.\r\nThe greater the number of Construction Drones, the faster the construction progress and the higher the energy consumption of the mecha core.
strings.通讯控制描述3: A Construction Drone can execute more construction tasks at one time.
strings.自动重建描述: Enhancing battle damage analysis technology facilitates the analysis of ruined buildings, enabling the marking of targets for expedited reconstruction.
strings.自动重建描述6: The ultimate Auto Reconstruction technology enables rapid analysis of ruined buildings, allowing for instantaneous marking of targets for reconstruction.
strings.批量建造描述: With this technology, the current Blueprint for production lines can be batch replicated to greatly facilitate construction. A saved Blueprint is available even in a different cluster.\r\n(The basic Mass Construction technology has a limit on facility number)
strings.批量建造描述2: Advanced Mass Construction technology that allows the construction of more facilities at once.
strings.批量建造描述5: The ultimate mass construction technology for Blueprint-based construction without facility limit.
strings.解锁能量护盾描述: An Energy Shield can resist damage from enemies and protect all facilities within its radius. Yet Energy Shields consume energy. Once this energy has been exhausted, it takes some time for Energy Shields to restart.
strings.能量护盾描述: Improve the base radius and the power of Icarus' Energy Shield.
strings.能量护盾描述7: Further Increase the power capacity of Icarus' Energy Shield.
strings.能量回路描述: Increases the energy <color="#FD965ECC">recovery speed</color> of the mecha core.\r\nThe higher the fuel chamber’s power, the faster the conversion of fuel into energy.
strings.无人机引擎描述: Technological breakthroughs in drone engines have increased the speed of Construction Drones.
strings.无人机引擎描述2: Further increases the speed of Construction Drones. This consumes more energy.
strings.驱动引擎描述: Press <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> twice to lift off; the speed of the mecha increases by <color="#FD965ECC">150%</color> when in Flight Mode. This consumes a high amount of energy.
strings.驱动引擎描述2: Press <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> twice to lift off. Press and hold the <color="#FD965ECC">key for forward movement</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> in Flight Mode to activate Cruise Mode at a certain altitude. In Cruise Mode, the mecha will orbit a planet at a higher speed.
strings.驱动引擎描述3: The max cruising speed of the mecha will be raised, but this will consume massive amounts of energy.
strings.驱动引擎描述4: Press <color="#FD965ECC">CAPSLOCK</color> to switch on the warp flight; 1x <color="#FD965ECC">Space Warper</color> will be consumed.
strings.驱动引擎描述5: The max warp flight speed of the mecha will be raised, but this will consume massive amounts of energy.\r\nPress [<color="#FD965ECC">SHIFT</color>] and [<color="#FD965ECC">S</color>] to control the warp flight speed.
strings.太阳帆寿命描述: Extends the service life of Solar Sails.
strings.射线传输效率描述: Reduce dissipation in solar ray transmission for higher transmission efficiency.
strings.垂直建造描述: Enable more effective space utilization for Depots, Storage Tanks, and Matrix Labs by allowing more levels to be built vertically.
strings.分拣器货物叠加描述: Increases the stack count of cargo in a Sorter Mk.III.
strings.配送范围描述: Increases the distribution range of a Logistics Distributor.
strings.运输船引擎描述: Increases the speed of a Logistics Drone.\r\nIncreases the speed of a Logistics Bot.
strings.运输船引擎描述2: Increases the speed of a Logistics Drone.\r\nIncreases the speed of a Logistics Bot.\r\nIncreases the speed of a Logistics Vessel.
strings.运输船引擎描述3:
Increases the speed of a Logistics Drone.
Increases the speed of a Logistics Bot.
Increases the speed of a Logistics Vessel.
Allows a Logistics Vessel to warp.
strings.运输机舱扩容描述: Greatly increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Drone by applying material compression technology to logistics.\r\nIncreases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Bot.
strings.运输机舱扩容描述2: Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Drone.\r\nFurther increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Bot.
strings.运输机舱扩容描述3: Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Drone.\r\nFurther increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Bot.\r\nIncreases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Vessel.
strings.运输机舱扩容描述4: Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Drone.\r\nFurther increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Bot.\r\nFurther increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Vessel.
strings.运输机舱扩容描述5:
Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Drone.
Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Bot.
Further increases the carrying capacity of a Logistics Vessel.
Increases the maximum storage capacity of a Logistics Station.
strings.运输站集装物流描述1: The integration count of outgoing cargo is configurable in the "Configuration" tab of a Logistics Station. If "Up to tech limit" is selected, the integration count will be configured automatically according to the maximum limit allowed by the currently unlocked technologies.
strings.运输站集装物流描述2: Further increases the integration count of outgoing cargo for Planetary and Interstellar Logistics Stations.
strings.矿物利用描述: Use resources effectively to significantly reduce ore loss per mining operation and increase mining speed.
strings.矿物利用描述2: Further reduces ore loss per mining operation.\r\nFurther increases mining speed.
strings.研究速度描述: Having a powerful and fast computer is essential to speeding up technological research.
strings.宇宙探索描述1: One step further on a planet is one step further into the universe. Everything encountered will be unfamiliar but intriguing!
strings.宇宙探索描述2: View the ore reserves in this planetary system.
strings.宇宙探索描述3: Everything is under control: View ore reserves in planetary systems within 6 light-years.
strings.宇宙探索描述4: Find rare ores in the universe to greatly boost production efficiency.
strings.动能武器伤害描述: Increase the damage inflicted by all Kinetic Weapons.
strings.能量武器伤害描述: Increase the damage inflicted by all Energy Weapons.
strings.爆炸武器伤害描述: Increase the damage inflicted by all Explosive Weapons.
strings.战斗无人机伤害描述: Increase the damage inflicted by Combat Drones.
strings.地面编队扩容描述1: Increase the number of Fleets so that Icarus can operate more Ground Squadrons.
strings.地面编队扩容描述2: Expand the capacity of Fleets so that Icarus' and each Battlefield Analysis Base's Ground Squadrons can accommodate more Combat Drones.
strings.太空编队扩容描述1: Increase the number of Fleets so that Icarus can control more Space Fleets.
strings.太空编队扩容描述2: Expand the capacity of Fleets so that each of Icarus' Space Fleets can accommodate more Warships.
strings.行星护盾描述: Enhance the force-field energy efficiency of a Planetary Shield.\r\nInitially, every 1 damage resisted consumes 400kJ of energy.
strings.干扰塔效果描述: Increase the damage and effectiveness of electromagnetic weapons.
strings.电磁学结果: You've unlocked a new type of automatic mining machine. It performs automatic mining ore for you. Its capacity is limited, so you might want to automatically deliver ores to the smelters.
strings.电磁矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Matrix Lab! Also called the CentreBrain Connector, it can be used to unlock new technologies by uploading matrices to it.
strings.高效电浆控制结果: You've mastered the Plasma Control technology. You can now build a Wireless Power Tower to transmit electricity remotely and charge the mecha. The next step could be to use this technology as a basis for researching the extraction and refining of crude oil.
strings.等离子萃取精炼结果: You can now extract crude oil, which can not only be used as an energy source but also be refined into various chemical products.
strings.X射线裂解结果: You've mastered the X-ray Cracking technology. Use it to crack refined oil into hydrogen and gain Energetic Graphite.
strings.重整精炼结果: You've mastered the Reformed Refinement technology. Use it to produce more refined oil for producing next-level chemical products.
strings.能量矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Energy Matrix, a powerful matrix that serves as one of the five source codes for CentreBrain to maintain Homeland simulation, but also the key to accessing more technologies.
strings.氢燃料棒结果: You have obtained a higher-energy fuel rod. Insert it into the mecha's fuel chamber to increase efficiency and speed up energy recovery.
strings.推进器结果: You've unlocked the Thruster. Use it as a Logistics Drone engine to transport cargo across the planet.
strings.加力推进器结果: You've unlocked the Augmented Thruster. Use it as a Logistics Vessel engine to enable interstellar cargo transportation.
strings.流体储存封装结果: You've unlocked the Fluid Encapsulation technology. Use it to deliver fluids via Conveyor Belts and store excess fluids in large-capacity Storage Tanks.
strings.基础化工结果: You've mastered the Basic Chemical Engineering technology. Establish Chemical Plants to produce more chemical products.
strings.高分子化工结果: You've unlocked the Polymer Engineering technology. This allows you to use Chemical Plants to produce Organic Crystal. Although the fuel chamber efficiency is reduced, the mecha can still use Organic Crystal as a source of fuel.
strings.高强度晶体结果: You've learned a method to prepare high-density crystal. The Titanium Crystal, a special kind of titanium atom crystal, can be obtained by altering the lattice structure of titanium atoms with Organic Crystal.
strings.结构矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Structure Matrix, a type of matrix that is one of the five source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. Uploading Structure Matrices to the CentreBrain will give you insight into material structures.
strings.卡西米尔晶体结果: You've unlocked the Casimir Crystal. Grating Crystal, a rare ore, facilitates the preparation of Casimir Crystal.
strings.高强度玻璃结果: You've unlocked the Titanium Glass, a kind of high-strength glass made from molten glass and a fixed proportion of additive titanium. Titanium Glass can be used in a relatively intense reaction environment.
strings.应用型超导体结果: You've obtained the graphene, a novel nanoscale superconductor with a broad range of uses. Fire Ice, a rare ore, can greatly improve the efficiency of grapehene preparation.
strings.高强度材料结果: You've obtained the Carbon Nanotube, a material with extraordinarily high strength and resistance to deformation that is harder than diamonds. The preparation of Carbon Nanotubes can be greatly facilitated by Stalagmite Crystal, a rare ore that can be found on marine planets.
strings.粒子可控技术结果: You've mastered the Particle Manipulation technology. Use it to impose a specific pattern on the movement of particles.
strings.重氢分馏结果: You've unlocked the Deuterium Fractionation technology. Establish a Fractionator to fractionate deuterium from liquid hydrogen. While the separation efficiency is limited, the production of deuterium signals the approach of a nuclear energy era.
strings.波函数干扰结果: You've mastered the Wave Function Interference technology. Use it to interfere with the wave functions of particles during a quantum jump and induce the quantum collapse that you desire.
strings.微型粒子对撞机结果: You've unlocked the Small Particle Collider. Use it to produce deuterium and Antimatter efficiently, though it requires a considerable amount of energy.
strings.奇异物质结果: You've obtained Strange Matter. It can warp the space around it, which fulfills the negative energy requirement of warp drives.
strings.人造恒星结果: You've unlocked the Artificial Sun. Use the power generation facility to efficiently transfer the massive energy from Antimatter Fuel Rods to the Power Grid in a stable and manageable manner.
strings.可控湮灭反应结果: You've mastered the technology for constraining annihilation reactions and achieving stable energy output. Use it to produce Antimatter Fuel Rods.
strings.增产剂 Mk.I结果: You've unlocked the Proliferator MK.I. By using a Spray Coater, Proliferator MK.I can be applied to cargo. This coating will result in extra products or a production speedup effect when the coated cargo is used as raw materials in the production of next-level products.
strings.增产剂 Mk.II结果: You've unlocked the Proliferator MK.II. Using the Proliferator MK.II to coat cargo can result in a significantly increased production speedup effect or a larger amount of extra products when the coated cargo is used as raw materials for next-level product manufacturing.
strings.增产剂 Mk.III结果: You've unlocked the Proliferator MK.III. Using the Proliferator MK.III to coat cargo before using it as raw materials for the next-level product manufacturing will further increase the yield of extra products or the production speedup effect. This shows the importance of ensuring a sufficient supply of raw materials and avoiding cargo overflow.
strings.基础制造工艺结果: You've unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.I. Use it to process iron ingots, copper ingots and other raw materials into advanced products. Obtain faster Assembling Machine by unlocking technologies.
strings.高速制造工艺结果: You've unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.II. Use it to increase the processing speed of raw materials and boost the speed of replication by 50%.
strings.量子打印技术结果: You’ve unlocked the Assembling Machine Mk.III. Use it to increase manufacturing speed by leveraging its integrated Quantum Printing technology to manipulate the particle structure at a more microscopic level. It also increases the speed of replication by 50%.
strings.处理器结果: You've unlocked the Processor. Use the large-scale integrated circuit to handle more complex data operations.
strings.量子芯片结果: You've unlocked the Quantum Chip. With a more powerful computing power and an ultra-fast computing speed, Quantum Chips can intelligently identify errors in quantum jump and deploy reverse intervention promptly.
strings.半导体材料结果: You've unlocked the Microcrystalline Component. Use the semiconductor to make more complex integrated circuits.
strings.信息矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Information Matrix, a matrix that serves as one of the five source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation. Upload Information Matrices to acquire more information management technologies, which can improve Homebase production efficiency.
strings.自动化冶金结果: You've unlocked the Arc Smelter. Build Arc Smelters to automatically produce basic materials, such as iron ingots and copper ingots. To achieve full automation, a Sorter is needed to automatically deliver ores from the Conveyor Belt to the Smelter.
strings.冶炼提纯结果: You've mastered a more advanced smelting technology. Arc Smelters now can be used for more effective ore purification and the production of higher-purity materials. Smelting stone into silicon is a good option on a planet lacking silicon veins.
strings.晶体冶炼结果: You have acquired expertise in an advanced smelting technology that can rapidly produce diamonds and other advanced materials by modifying the atomic layout of simple substances.
strings.钢材冶炼结果: You've mastered the Steel Smelting technology. It is a more advanced method for smelting iron ingots into steel with superior mechanical properties.
strings.火力发电结果: The Thermal Power Plant is now available, a power generation facility that partially converts the heat energy of combustible fuels to electricity.
strings.钛矿冶炼结果: You've mastered the Titanium Ore Smelting technology. You can now smelt titanium ores into lightweight and high-density titanium ingots.
strings.高强度钛合金结果: You've obtained the Titanium Alloy. This novel alloy material demonstrates better strength and toughness.
strings.移山填海工程结果: You've unlocked the Foundation. The Foundation is essential for modifying terrains, such as soil extraction from raised surfaces, land reclamation, or returning the altitude to zero.
strings.微型核聚变发电结果: The Mini Fusion Power Plant is now available. This power generation facility converts energy generated from the controlled deuterium burning in the Deuteron Fuel Rods into electricity.
strings.位面冶金结果: You've unlocked the <color="#FD965ECC">Plane Smelter</color>. This more advanced smelter has twice the efficiency of an Arc Smelter! However, the <color="#FD965ECC">Unipolar Magnet</color> is required to produce it.
strings.太阳能收集结果: The Solar Panel is now available. This power generation facility converts solar radiation energy into electrical energy during the day and stores the surplus electricity in Accumulators.
strings.光子变频结果: You've unlocked the Photon Combiner. It continuously absorbs low-energy photons to generate a high-energy photon. Try using Grating Crystal to produce it. The process may surprise you.
strings.太阳帆轨道系统结果: The EM-Rail Ejector is now available to powerfully eject Solar Sails to the Dyson Swarm. The limited life span of a Solar Sail can be extended by upgrading technologies.
strings.射线接收站结果: The Ray Receiver is now available for receiving high-energy rays from the Dyson Sphere and transmitting the received energy to the Power Grid directly.
strings.行星电离层利用结果: You've mastered the Planetary Ionosphere Utilization technology. Consume <color="#FD965ECC">Graviton Lenses</color> to increase the maximum output power of Ray Receivers.
strings.狄拉克逆变机制结果: You've mastered the Mass-energy Storage technology. The Photon Generation mode of Ray Receivers is now available, and Small Particle Colliders can now invert Critical Photons into Antimatter.
strings.宇宙矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Universe Matrix. As an ultimate product of the theory of everything, the all-encompassing matrix explains the ultimate mystery of the universe.
strings.任务完成结果: Congratulations! Builder of the Great Civilization! Program completed! (You can continue your journey after completion)
strings.能量储存结果: You've mastered the Energy Storage technology. You can now store surplus power in the Power Grid to Accumulators. Accumulators will automatically discharge electricity when the power supply is insufficient.
strings.星际电力运输结果: You've unlocked the Energy Exchanger. An Energy Exchanger enables the conversion of surplus power in the Power Grid into full Accumulators, or discharge the electrical power from full Accumulators to supply facilities.
strings.高强度轻质结构结果: You've unlocked the Frame Material. Due to its excellent resistance to stellar gravity pull, this new high-density, lightweight element is used to produce Dyson Sphere Components that will be then launched onto the Dyson Sphere to form its Nodes and Frames.
strings.垂直发射井结果: You've unlocked the Vertical Silo. Build Vertical Silos to launch Small Carrier Rockets that are loaded with Dyson Sphere Components.
strings.戴森球应力系统结果: You’ve increased the maximum latitude of the Dyson Sphere Nodes.
strings.基础物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Conveyor Belt and the Sorter. Build the two basic facilities for automated logistics to enable automatic delivery of ores stored in Mining Machines to Smelters or Depots.
strings.改良物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Splitter. Use three different patterns of a Splitter to divide cargo into multiple batches for easier sorting or to manage the workload of multiple Conveyor Belts.
strings.高效物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Conveyor Belt with the greatest carrying capacity, a more efficient Sorter, and Depot with increased capacity.
strings.集装物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Auto-piler. By installing an Auto-piler on a Conveyor Belt and ensuring a sufficient power supply, two successive objects on the Conveyor Belt can be integrated into one, significantly increasing the carrying capacity of the Conveyor Belt.
strings.配送物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Logistics Distributor and the Logistics Bot. Build Logistics Distributors on top of Depots and deploy Logistics Bots to deliver cargo to other Logistics Distributors or Icarus according to the configured conditions.
strings.行星物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Planetary Logistics Station and the Logistics Drone. These two basic facilities of the remote logistics system allow Logistics Drones to transport cargo automatically between Logistics Stations according to the configured conditions.
strings.星际物流系统结果: You've unlocked the Interstellar Logistics Station. This giant space elevator enables interstellar cargo transportation between Logistics Stations across planets via Logistics Vessels.
strings.气态行星开采结果: You've unlocked the Orbital Collector. You can use it to extract resources from gas giants. A portion of the extracted fuel is consumed for its operation and maintenance.
strings.电磁驱动结果: You've unlocked the Electric Motor. Use it to accelerate machine operation and to improve the speed of the mecha in the early stage.
strings.磁悬浮技术结果: You've unlocked the Electromagnetic Turbine. Use it to generate magnetic force to levitate objects.
strings.粒子磁力阱结果: You've unlocked the Particle Container. It can be used to immobilize particles at specific locations and induce them to exhibit certain characteristics.
strings.引力波折射结果: You've mastered the Gravitational Wave Refraction technology. Use Graviton Lenses to build the Space Warper that enables warp flights of the mecha and Logistics Vessels.
strings.引力矩阵结果: You've unlocked the Gravity Matrix. As one of the five source codes for maintaining the CentreBrain simulation, the matrix has reconciled the Quantum Field Theory and the General Theory of Relativity.
strings.超级磁场发生器结果: You've mastered the Super Magnetic Field Excitation technology. Use it to create high-performance materials by inducing atomic-scale lattice distortion in materials.
strings.卫星配电系统结果: You've unlocked the Satellite Substation, which expands the transmission range and increases the power supply coverage.
strings.地热开采结果: You've mastered the Geothermal Extraction technology. Construct Geothermal Power Stations to transform the immense energy from the magma of lava planets into electrical power that can be transmitted to the Power Grid.
strings.大型采矿机结果: You've unlocked the Advanced Mining Machine with easier deployment and improved mining efficiency. Use Conveyor Belts to deliver the collected ores or to enable automatic delivery of ores set as <color="#FD965ECC">"Supply"</color> to Logistics Stations in <color="#FD965ECC">"Demand"</color> by Logistics Drones.
strings.高级化工结果: You've unlocked the Submicroscopic Quantum Entanglement technology. This will completely replace traditional chemical engineering. Now more advanced chemical plants can be established.
strings.武器系统结果: You've unlocked the Weapon System. Now you can defend your base against raids and survive from the dangers of this universe.
strings.燃烧单元结果: You've unlocked Combustible Units, a highly cost-effective fuel. Further research discovered that this can be used to make shells.
strings.爆破单元结果: You've unlocked Explosive Units. This efficient and stable explosive can be used to manufacture all types of explosive weapons.
strings.晶石爆破单元结果: You've unlocked Crystal Explosive Units. Casimir Crystal shards can inflict more damage and are a raw material used to make Crystal Shell Sets.
strings.动力引擎结果: You've unlocked the Engine. This simple engine can provide a stable output of power for assembling all types of aircraft.
strings.导弹防御塔结果: You've unlocked Missile Turrets. These turrets can accurately hit ground and space targets and offer all-around protection.
strings.聚爆加农炮结果: You've unlocked Implusion Cannon. It can inflict damage to enemies in a wide range, but it can't be used to attack enemies nearby.
strings.信号塔结果: You've unlocked Signal Towers. These can affect Dark Fog's behavior, enrich your tactics, and expand the attack range of Missile Turrets.
strings.行星防御系统结果: You've unlocked the Planetary Defense System. You can build a shield covering the whole planet, but this will consume a massive amount of energy. Fortunately, this shield means that enemies from deep space will no longer be like the Sword of Damocles overhead.
strings.干扰塔结果: You have unlocked the Jammer Tower.
strings.磁化电浆炮结果: You've obtained Plasma Turret. It can emit high-speed plasma beams and is extremely penetrating and destructive. Such Turrets specialize in hitting space enemies and can inflict great damage.
strings.钛化弹箱结果: You've unlocked Titanium Ammo Box. This is a type of a Magnum Ammo Box that is highly penetrating.
strings.超合金弹箱结果: You've unlocked Superalloy Ammo Box, the most penetrating type of magnum ammo. Even if an enemy's armor is hard to penetrate, this ammo won't fail you.
strings.高爆炮弹组结果: You've unlocked High-explosive Shell Set. This optimized shell formula can inflict higher Explosive Damage.
strings.超音速导弹组结果: You've unlocked Supersonic Missile Set. These missiles fly faster and are more destructive than most.
strings.晶石炮弹组结果: You've unlocked Crystal Shell Set. It has a more intense shattering effect that can inflict more damage.
strings.引力导弹组结果: You've unlocked Gravity Missile Set. Strange Matter's negative gravitational pressure will keep accelerating it.
strings.反物质胶囊结果: You've unlocked Antimatter Capsule. The majority of enemies will be immediately destroyed by its annihilation reaction, making it the ultimate energy weapon.
strings.地面战斗机-A型结果: You've unlocked Precision Drone. Upgraded by the prototype, it has the longest attack range of all fighters.
strings.地面战斗机-E型结果: You've unlocked Prototype. It provides assurance to Icarus when the latter launches attacks.
strings.地面战斗机-F型结果: You've unlocked Attack Drone. Modified from the prototype, it has a stronger weapon system that can attack enemies in close quarters.
strings.太空战斗机-A型结果: You've unlocked Corvette. This is a type of small spacecraft. When the battlefield shifts from ground to space, your space force will play a vital role.
strings.太空战斗机-F型结果: You've unlocked Destroyer. This is a type of medium-sized Warships. It is powerful and sturdy, and advantageous to have in the space battle.
strings.战场分析基站结果: You've unlocked Battlefield Analysis Base. Equipped with 12 Construction Drones, it can automatically build and repair. It can also deploy Combat Drones to the base and complete defense missions.
strings.数字模拟计算结果: You've unlocked Digital Analog Computation. You can now build a Self-evolution Lab, which is three times faster than Matrix Lab in terms of research and matrix production speeds.
strings.物质重组技术结果: You've obtained Matter Re-combination technology. This enables matter to be re-composed at particle size. In combination with Quantum Printing technology, you will be able to build faster re-composing assemblers.
strings.负熵递归结果: You've revealed the mystery of negentropy recursion. After energy has been put in continuously, negentropy generated from a Smelter can be efficiently purified, thus making smelting more efficient.
strings.金色燃料棒结果: You have unlocked energy resonance, allowing the utilization of resonant particles to manufacture fuel rods with higher energy.
strings.机甲核心结果: You have increased the durability, laser attack range, laser weapon damage and energy capacity of mecha.
strings.机甲核心结果2: You've significantly improved Icarus' durability, damage inflicted by laser weapons, and maximum Core Energy.
strings.通讯控制结果1: The number of Construction Drones that can be controlled simultaneously has increased.
strings.通讯控制结果2: The number of Construction Drones that can be controlled simultaneously has increased.
strings.通讯控制结果3: The maximum number of construction tasks that a single Construction Drone can execute at once has been increased.
strings.通讯控制结果4: The number of Construction Drones that can be controlled simultaneously has increased.
strings.通讯控制结果5: The number of Construction Drones that can be controlled simultaneously has increased.
strings.通讯控制结果6: The maximum number of construction tasks that a single Construction Drone can execute at once has been increased.
strings.通讯控制结果7: The number of Construction Drones that can be controlled simultaneously has increased.
strings.自动重建结果: Now target marking and reconstruction is faster.
strings.自动重建结果6: You've unlocked the highest level of Auto Reconstruction Marking. Now you can instantly mark buildings that require reconstruction within the marking radius.
strings.批量建造结果:
Blueprint creation is now available.
Press [CTRL + C] to duplicate a production line and save it as a Blueprint.
Press [CTRL + V] to load a Blueprint for batch construction.
(Blueprints can be used in another planet, planetary system or cluster)
strings.批量建造结果5: Facility quantity limit is now removed for Blueprint-based construction.
strings.解锁能量护盾结果: You've unlocked Energy Shield. It can resist any damage inflicted by enemies and protect all facilities within its radius. However, Core Energy is required to charge it. With higher level fuel, charging will be faster.
strings.能量护盾结果: Energy Shield's base radius and maximum capacity are increased.
strings.能量护盾结果7: Energy Shield's maximum capacity is increased.
strings.能量回路结果: Power generation output of your mecha increased. The mecha's energy recovery is now faster if there is fuel in its fuel chamber.
strings.驱动引擎结果1: Flight Mode is enabled. Speed of the mecha increases by <color="#FD965ECC">150%</color> in Flight Mode. Press <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> twice to lift off.
strings.驱动引擎结果2: Cruise Mode is enabled. Press <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> twice to lift off. Press and hold the <color="#FD965ECC">key for forward movement</color> and <color="#FD965ECC">SPACE</color> in Flight Mode to activate Cruise Mode at a certain altitude.
strings.驱动引擎结果3: Cruising speed of the mecha in space increased.
strings.驱动引擎结果4: Warp flight is enabled. Press <color="#FD965ECC">CAPSLOCK</color> to switch on the warp flight. Activating warp flight will consume 1x <color="#FD965ECC">Space Warper</color>.
strings.驱动引擎结果5: Warp flight speed of the mecha increased.
strings.太阳帆寿命结果: Service life and working duration of Solar Sails are extended.
strings.射线传输效率结果: Solar ray transmission dissipation reduced and transmission efficiency increased.
strings.分拣器货物叠加结果: The number of cargo that the Sorter MK.III carries each time increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果1: Speed of Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果2: Speed of Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果3: Speed of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果4: Logistics Vessels can now activate warp flight by consuming one <color="#FD965ECC">Space Warper</color>.\r\nSpeed of Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果5: Speed of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果6: Speed of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输船引擎结果7: Speed of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果1: Delivery capacity of Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果2: Delivery capacity of Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果3: Delivery capacity of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果4: Delivery capacity of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果5: Delivery capacity of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.
strings.运输机舱扩容结果6: Delivery capacity of Logistics Vessels, Logistics Drones and Logistics Bots increased.\r\nStorage capacity of Planetary and Interstellar Logistics Stations increased.
strings.矿物利用结果: Ore loss during mining operations is lower, and mining is faster.
strings.垂直建造结果: The number of levels that can be built vertically for Depots, Storage Tanks, and Matrix Labs has increased.
strings.研究速度结果: Research speed of Matrix Labs increased.
strings.宇宙探索结果1: You can now view the distribution of ore reserves on the planet. All ores on this planet can be located more easily now.
strings.宇宙探索结果2: You can now view the distribution of ore reserves in the planetary system. It will now be easier to plan for different productions lines.
strings.宇宙探索结果3: You can now view the distribution of ore reserves in planetary systems within 6 light-years. You can exploit resources in any planetary system within 6 light-years.
strings.宇宙探索结果4: You can now view the details of rare ores and all ore reserves across all planetary systems. An intergalactic industrial empire is taking shape.
strings.运输站集装物流结果1: The integration count of outgoing cargo is configurable in the "Configuration" tab of the Planetary Logistics Station and the Interstellar Logistics Station. If "Up to tech limit" is selected, the integration count of outgoing cargo will be automatically configured according to the maximum limit allowed by the currently unlocked technologies.
strings.运输站集装物流结果2: Cargo integration capacity of Planetary and Interstellar Logistics Stations increased. The integration count of outgoing cargo is now configurable in the "Configuration" tab of a Logistics Station.
strings.动能武器伤害结果: Now the damage inflicted by all Kinetic Weapons has increased.
strings.能量武器伤害结果: Now the damage inflicted by all Energy Weapons has increased.
strings.爆炸武器伤害结果: Now the damage inflicted by all Explosive Weapons has increased.
strings.战斗无人机伤害结果: Now the damage inflicted by all Combat Drones has increased.
strings.战斗无人机攻击速度结果: The attack speed of Fighters has increased.
strings.战斗无人机引擎结果: The speed of Fighters has increased.
strings.战斗无人机耐久结果: Now Combat Drones' armor has been improved.
strings.地面编队扩容结果1: Now Icarus can control more Ground Squadrons.
strings.地面编队扩容结果2: Now Icarus' and the Battlefield Analysis Base's Ground Squadrons can accommodate more Combat Drones.
strings.太空编队扩容结果1: Now Icarus can control more Space Fleets.
strings.太空编队扩容结果2: Now Icarus' Space Fleets can accommodate more Warships.
strings.行星护盾结果: The force-field energy efficiency of the Planetary Shield has been improved. It also consumes less energy each time it resists 1 damage.
strings.干扰塔效果结果: The damage and effectiveness of electromagnetic weapons have increased.
strings.E中枢核心: The pinnacle of mechanical engineering in the previous era. Although its past glory has waned due to cosmic radiation, its internal mechanical structure remains intact and operates unceasingly to monitor and manage the whole Hive's expansion. Central Core constructs Relay Stations that build Planetary Bases on each planet. Central Core will consume massive amounts of energy and matter to create the Seed during the late growth phase of the Hive. It will also dispatch the Seed to new planetary systems to grow into new Dark Fog Hives.
strings.E日蚀要塞装配港: Hive's production facility is used to construct Eclipse Fortress, the ultimate unit that strikes countless fears into people's hearts. Eclipse Fortress Port is huge, making it a landmark of Dark Fog Hive. Eclipse Fortress Port consumes massive amounts of energy and matter. Unless the Hive reaches the late growth phase, this structure won't be built.
strings.E巨鲸装配港: Hive's production facility is used to produce the Humpback, a space unit. Research on the Dark Fog Hive's genetic model reveals the Humpback Port is usually built during the early growth phase of the Hive. Compared with fierce Lancers, Humpbacks that can move freely in the Hive may be more suitable for protecting the Hive during its early phase.
strings.E枪骑装配港: Hive's production facility. Thanks to zero gravity in space, the Port can manufacture Lancers at any angle and deploy them around the Hive. Lancer Port has high production efficiency. Lancer Arrays surrounding the Hive are commonly observed in the vicinity.
strings.E光能接收站: With a design concept similar to the Dyson Sphere Node, this is the Hive's main way of obtaining energy. As its underlying logic is consistent with the Dyson Sphere Node, we can't prevent the Photon Receiver from taking energy from the Dyson Sphere.
strings.E等离子发生塔: Plasma Generation Tower can use Generators in a regular tetrahedron to easily stimulate matter and get it to reach an upper state. It can also directly produce plasma with high temperature and density in the center. This plasma has an extremely high energy-releasing capability and radiates powerful heat. It can inflict devastating damage to targets.
strings.E相位激光塔: It is equipped with several Phase Wave Exciters. These exciters can accurately regulate laser, enhance phases, and release well-focused lasers with high energy density.
strings.E种子节点: Starting point and cornerstone of Hive expansion. These nodes contain plentiful benchmarked mechanical interfaces, making it possible to derive structures with varied functions. Stem cells can become specialized cells. Similarly, Seed Nodes can build in-demand structures to satisfy the diverse needs of the Hive.
strings.E水平连接桥: As the skeleton and blood vessels of the Space Hive, the Bridge plays a vital role. The Horizontal Bridge grows between terminals and connects the Hive into an organic entirety. Ants shuttle back and forth on the bridge, transporting matter and energy tirelessly and sending information and resources to every corner of the Hive.
strings.E纵向通道: The Channel is another important hub of the Space Hive. Though shorter, its role should not be overlooked. As a bond between the upper and lower layers of the Hive, matter and energy are vertically transported via the Vertical Channel. This channel ensures the Hive's smooth flow of resources and effective transmission of information.
strings.E日蚀要塞: According to warnings sent by the cluster most severely eroded by Dark Fog, we've received such a message, "An unexpected eclipse appears above the star... No, it's a fortress!" Fortunately, the unit in the cluster hasn't woken. Let's pray to CenterBrain that the Eclipse Fortress will never awaken.
strings.E巨鲸: A defense unit that flies tirelessly within the Hive. So far, no Humpback has ever left the Hive to attack engineers.
strings.E枪骑: As shown in reports on the Dark Fog received by COSMO, most engineers have mentioned the daunting power of Lancers. A Lancer is an extremely aggressive space unit. When attacking, it first scans its targets with a transverse laser, and then it enters the planet's orbit to bombard the ground.
strings.E中继站: The Central Core dispatches Relay Stations to planets to build Planetary Bases as needed. After constructing a Planetary Base, the Relay Station continues to stay above that Planetary Base to connect between the Planetary Base and the Hive. It will dispatch vessels to transfer the Base's matter production to the Hive and ship back energy to the Base. Relays are the last ensurance of the Hive. If a Planetary Base is destroyed, its Relay will try to rebuild it if thers is remaining matter and energy. If the Central Core of a Hive is destroyed, Relays will send Heavy Barge to reconstruct the Core. Given the importance of Relay Stations, attacking them amounts to declaring full-scale war on the Dark Fog. Some hapless engineers have ended up as its casualties, even though they just wanted to test the Missile Turrets.
strings.E火种: A product of Hive expansion. Building it consumes a massive amount of matter and energy. Once the Seed has been created, it will go to a new planetary system to form its own Hive. The Seed represents an irrepressible threat. Letting it go means that Dark Fog will spread and occupy the whole universe.
strings.E行星基地: Dark Fog's brain above the planet, it follows two simplest rules:\r\nFirst, never build unnecessary structures;\r\nSecond, clear any threats near the base. A Planetary Base will regularly assess its nearby environment. If a threat is identified, it will give an order to its Camps to accelerate production. A Planetary Base will dig wells deep into the planet to exploit core matter. Such matter will then be used to build structures and units. This technology grants a high degree of freedom in evolution to its units, and this may have induced Dark Fog's variation. Therefore, this technology has been prohibited by the COSMO Technology Ethics Committee. You can still see the core even after a Planetary Base is destroyed. Frankly, only a few engineers were lucky enough to witness this.
strings.E强袭者营地: Dark Fog's production facility, which is used to produce powerful close-quarter ground units like Raiders. Raiders float above the ground and possess formidable attack and defense capability. Raiders are named after an extremely curious engineer. After landing, he went to search the ground base but was then raided by a newly produced Raider.
strings.E游骑兵营地: Dark Fog's production facility, which is used to build long-range ground units like Rangers. Before variation, Rangers had been the defensive security system of the ground base. They patrolled around the base to clear away any threats. After variation, they become more aggressive.
strings.E守卫者营地: Dark Fog's production facility, which is used to build powerful ground defense units like Guardians. Guardians offer strong protection to nearby Dark Fog, which is how they got their name.
strings.E高能激光塔: Three main pumping sources stimulate its lasers. Meanwhile, three energy boosters are equipped to improve the control of the lasers. This design optimizes laser output with higher energy while still maintains high stability and accuracy. It usually appears on the periphery of the Planetary Base.
strings.E等离子哨戒塔: High-energy crystals are used as its plasma exciter. They can quickly stimulate plasmas to be used as weapons. They usually appear inside a Planetary Base to provide powerful suppressive fire.
strings.E等离子护盾: Although this building is mentioned in all reports, for now we still don't know its specific functions. It is huge and eye-catching. Maybe it connects the Planetary Base and the Hive. Or maybe it's still developing. Research on it is still in progress. Hopefully its mystery will be revealed one day.
strings.E导轨: An important Planetary Base facility. It serves as a channel for rapid transport of matter and energy.  Guideways use high-speed EM mechanics to connect all areas of the base. They are usually linear and extend along main routes in the base to connect facilities. To achieve mutual transportation of resources, Guideways have evolved and can now support two-way transport. Trucks shuttle back and forth continuously along these rails to transfer matter and energy.
strings.E强袭者: One of Dark Fog's ground units. It has strong attack and defense capabilities. Raiders float above the ground. They're slow and their attack range is short, but their electric arcs can pierce the defenses of their targets and inflict great damage. In addition to its strong attack capability, their solid armor can effectively resist attacks. This means they can survive for a long time on the Battlefield as they fight.
strings.E游骑兵: One of Dark Fog's ground units. They have high speed and long-range attack capabilities. Unlike other units, Rangers fly freely in the air thanks to their light mechanical structure and advanced propulsion system. Also, they move quickly on the battlefield to approach their targets. Meanwhile, their high-precision, long-range weapons can hit distant enemies.
strings.E守卫者: One of Dark Fog's ground units, they have outstanding defense capability. The mission of Guardians is to protect other units from attack. Their advanced sensors and computing systems can accurately identify hostile trajectory and target location. Once Guardians discover that Dark Fog is about to be attacked, they will swiftly use their armor to withstand damages and protect nearby units.
strings.E地核钻井: A drilled well made by a Planetary Base. It has reached the core of the planet, so you can see boiling lava. The well can be buried with enormous quantities of sand piles. Maybe COSMO wouldn't mind if we just use the lava's heat.
strings.上次退出存档不为最新提示: Unknown problem occurred at last exit. Suggestion: Select and load suitable saved game in [Load Game].
strings.新游戏元数据提示描述: During the game, Metadata assets are produced and can rebuild destroyed Icarus. They can also be utilized in the subsequent game at various cluster addresses, <color="#FD965ECC">buyout</color> technology or <color="#FD965ECC">instantiate</color> them as matrices and add them to Inventory.\r\n\r\nNote: The highest Metadata value at a cluster address that has more than one saved game created would be the Metadata value of that cluster address.
strings.新游戏沙盒模式提示描述: This game mode disregards restrictions and allows creativity to run wild!\r\nSandbox Mode offers the possibility to unlock technologies in the Technology Tree, acquire and utilize items without limit, build instantaneously, and navigate between planets, allowing you to have unrestricted control over your actions in the expansive universe.
strings.开启黑雾描述:
A more challenging mode!
After Enemy Force is enabled, Dark Fog will spread in the universe to encroach resources for production and combat.

You can decide Dark Fog's characteristics, either Fury or Dummy. Different difficulties mean different kinds of combat between you and Dark Fog!
Certainly, you can disable Enemy Forces. You will enjoy the universe's charm in awe, free from Dark Fog.

Notes: Once set, you can't turn Enemy Forces on or off during the whole game, nor can you modify detailed settings.
strings.黑雾攻击性描述:
This option adjusts Dark Fog's aggressiveness: <color=#ff965ec0>(Can't be modified in-game)</color>

<color=#61D8FFb0>Dummy</color>: The mechanical pets will never attack you. Devastate them!
<color=#61D8FFb0>Passive</color>: Dark Fog won't take the initiative to attack you. It only strikes back, when you attack it.
<color=#61D8FFb0>Torpid</color>: Dark Fog will measure the player's threat and actively attack, but not aggressively.
<color=#61D8FFb0>Normal</color>: Dark Fog will measure the player's threat and actively attack, but act normally aggressive.
<color=#61D8FFb0>Sharp</color>: Strongly aggressive Dark Fog. Once provoked, it's a narrow escape!
<color=#61D8FFb0>Rampage</color>: These clusters' Dark Fog has gotten completely out of control. No explorer has sent back any message so far!
strings.初始等级修正描述: Dark Fog will upgrade by continuously gaining XP in battle. As their level grows, Dark Fog Hive's scale, and Dark Fog units' attack and health will gradually rise.\r\n\r\nThis option sets the initial levels of all Dark Fog Hives and Planetary Bases in the cluster.
strings.初始生长情况描述:
This option defines the initial growth of Dark Fog Space Hive.

0% means most Space Hives are at the early growth phase when the game begins.
200% means most Space Hives are at the late growth phase or fully-built when the game begins.
strings.初始占领情况描述: This option defines Dark Fog's initial occupation in the current cluster.\r\n\r\nHigher value means more planetary systems in the cluster are occupied by Dark Fog at the beginning of the game.
strings.最大黑雾密度描述: This option defines the max ratio of Dark Fog Space Hives in every planetary system.
strings.电力威胁系数描述: Dark Fog will comprehensively determine the player's threat against them, based on player's behavior, including factory development and aggressiveness.\r\n\r\nThis option defines the threat of the player's factory power consumption against Dark Fog.
strings.战斗威胁系数描述: Dark Fog will comprehensively determine the player's threat against it, based on player's behavior, including factory development and aggressiveness.\r\n\r\nThis option defines the threat of the player's attack against Dark Fog.
strings.黑雾战斗经验描述: Dark Fog will upgrade by continuously gaining XP in the battle against the player.\r\n\r\nThis option defines how fast can Dark Fog gain XP in the fight.
strings.生长速度系数描述: This option defines the growth speed of Space Hives and Planetary Bases.
strings.有效难度描述: The "Valid Difficulty" is determined by the lowest difficulty factor ever reached in the game if the Dark Fog Communicator is used.\r\n\r\nThis factor will be used to calculate the player's metadata multiplier and achievement unlocks associated with a difficulty factor.
strings.黑雾设置无法更改提示: (All settings above can't be modified in-game)
strings.黑雾设置退出提示: Settings on this page won't be saved (Unsaved changes will be reverted)\r\n\r\nGo Back?
strings.戴森球总发电量: Total Power Generation by Dyson Spheres
strings.银河系COSMO描述: As a member of the COSMO and pioneer of Dyson Sphere Program, the energy you contribute will undoubtedly propel the rapid advancement of Homeland. Your contribution to the upcoming Civilization Type III is forever recorded with the activation of this cluster, as people light up a star in the Milky Way View to honor your achievements!
strings.地中海介绍:
A Mariterra type planet is where the COSMO (Coalition of Stellar Management Organizations) chose Icarus to launch the Dyson Sphere Program.
COSMO's considerations are extensive and thorough; it is a well known fact that these planets are extremely rare within the universe. A glimpse from space reveals that Mariterra planets have a very similar landscape and climate to that of our home planet, which not only relieves Icarus of its homesickness, but also provides a familiar environment for it to get into the swing of its workflow.
The planets’ fragmented continental shelves may lead to more diverse civilizations of local intelligent life.
